name: Color Space Converter

inputs.name: Conversion Type
inputs.description: The two conversion color spaces, supporting “RGBA to HSLA”, “RGBA to HSVA”, “HSVA to RGBA”, and “HSLA to RGBA”

outputs.name: Output Color
outputs.description: The output color in the new color space

description: Convert a color from one color space to another. It supports RGBA to HSLA, RGBA to HSVA, HSVA to RGBA, and HSLA to RGBA.
